plays.text: Goal scored by Luke Richardson assisted by Justin Williams and Jeremy Roenick
Penalty to Jason Marshall 2 minutes for Boarding Ruslan Fedotenko
Goal scored by Mark Recchi assisted by Kim Johnsson and John LeClair
Penalty to Paul Ranheim 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Filip Kuba
Goal scored by Wes Walz assisted by Andy Sutton and Jason Marshall
Goal scored by Jan Hlavac assisted by Eric Weinrich and Jiri Dopita
Goal scored by Jan Hlavac assisted by Mark Recchi
Penalty to Paul Ranheim 2 minutes for Interference Andrew Brunette
Penalty to Willie Mitchell 2 minutes for Holding John LeClair
Penalty to Matt Johnson 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Kent Manderville
Penalty to Jeremy Roenick 2 minutes for Charging Willie Mitchell
Penalty to Wes Walz 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Keith Primeau assisted by Simon Gagne and Mark Recchi
Penalty to Kim Johnsson 2 minutes for Elbowing Andy Sutton
Penalty to Brad Brown 5 minutes for Fighting Keith Primeau
Penalty to Keith Primeau 5 minutes for Fighting Brad Brown
Penalty to Brad Brown 2 minutes for Roughing Keith Primeau served by Matt Johnson
